== Description ==
Retrieve path of paged [[Templates|template]] in current or parent template. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_paged_template() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Result of [[Function_Reference/get_query_template|<tt>get_query_template('paged')</tt>]].

<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->
